name: io.bytes.per.checksum
description:
The number of bytes per checksum.  Must not be larger than
  io.file.buffer.size.

name: dfs.image.parallel.target.sections
description:
Controls the number of sub-sections that will be written to
        fsimage for each section. This should be larger than
        dfs.image.parallel.threads, otherwise all threads will not be
        used when loading. Ideally, have at least twice the number
        of target sections as threads, so each thread must load more
        than one section to avoid one long running section affecting
        the load time.

name: dfs.datanode.slowpeer.low.threshold.ms
description: Threshold in milliseconds below which a DataNode is definitely not slow.

name: dfs.webhdfs.netty.high.watermark
description: High watermark configuration to Netty for Datanode WebHdfs.

name: dfs.datanode.transfer.socket.recv.buffer.size
description:
Socket receive buffer size for DataXceiver (receiving packets from client
    during block writing). This may affect TCP connection throughput.
    If it is set to zero or negative value, no buffer size will be set
    explicitly, thus enable tcp auto-tuning on some system.
    The default value is 0.

name: dfs.namenode.reencrypt.edek.threads
description:
Maximum number of re-encrypt threads to contact the KMS
    and re-encrypt the edeks.

name: dfs.namenode.top.num.users
description: Number of top users returned by the top tool

name: fs.s3a.socket.send.buffer
description: Socket send buffer hint to amazon connector. Represented in bytes.
